Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product is not just an item; it's an investment that promises unparalleled performance and longevity. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $18000. This price reflects its true worth and the opportunity to own a piece that stands out in terms of functionality and design. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
